page.title: 13CHILD'S DAY,DENESIDE,SEAHAM
page.content: IF IT IS NOT A SHOOL DAY THEN I WILL GET OUT OF BED AT ABOUT 8 O CLOCK.I HAVE TOAST OR CEREAL FOR BREAKFAST.I USUALLY CALL ROUND FOR MY FRIENDS AND WE PLAY.SOMETIMES WE GO WALKING.WE COLLECT TADPOLES AND INSECTS.I HAVE A BIKE.IT IS A BMX BIKE.SOME OF MY FRIENDS HAVE BIKES AND WE GO CYCLING TOGETHER.WE SOMETIMES PLAY FOOTBALL IN THE PARK OR IN THE STREET.WE HAVE TO BE CAREFUL IN THE STREET BECAUSE OF THE TRAFFIC.ON HOT DAYS WE PLAY CRICKET.WE ALSO HAVE A GAME CALLED HIDE AND SEEK.ONE PERSON COVERS THEIR EYES AND THE OTHERS HIDE.THEN THE PERSON MUST FIND ALL THE OTHERS BEFORE THEY CAN GET BACK TO HIS SPOT. SOMETIMES WE PLAY THIS GAME ON OUR BIKES.SOME DAYS I GO SHOPPING WITH MY MAM AND DAD.I'M OLD ENOUGH NOW TO GO TO THE SHOPS FOR MY MAM ON MY OWN.
